ygData.subject: RE: Warriors do not suck
ygData.msgSnippet: A good place to get information on weapons would be EQ`Lizer or Everlore. Not gonna make it to easy on you and give you the site URLs *grin.  (You know where
ygData.messageBody:
A good place to get information on weapons would be EQ`Lizer or Everlore.
Not gonna make it to easy on you and give you the site URLs *grin. (You
know where they are already I am sure.)

As far as strentgh goes, with my warrior 128 STR and a BBC I can hit for max
of 50 at level 32. The STR bonuses do not kick in until after level 20.
And even then I do not believe they are fully applicable until level 25.
When I was grouped with a High Elf Paladin of equivelant level with only a
100 STR he could hit for approximately 44 or so. So I do not thing STR
plays that great of a role in damage. Its more for carrying
items/armor/loot.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Davis, Chad (cdavis) [mailto:cdavis@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 4:31 PM
> To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [warriors_eq] Warriors do not suck
>
>
> From: "Davis, Chad (cdavis)" <cdavis@...>
>
> 2 questions for the knowledgable.
>
> Anyone have a good list of Warrior weapons and where to find
> them? (ie) mob
> name and zone?
> I've been thinking of traveling a bit with my troll and want to
> go somewhere
> to have a chance at a good item.
> I am level 19
>
> Also: What damage difference between say... an Ogre strength of 135 and a
> Human strength of 100 make in terms
> of damage with weapons?
>
